models.name: Random Forest
models.description: An ensemble learning method for classification and regression that operates by constructing multiple decision trees.

models.name: Gradient Boosting Machine
models.description: A machine learning technique for regression and classification problems, which builds a model in a stage-wise fashion from weak learners.

models.name: Support Vector Machine
models.description: A supervised learning model that analyzes data for classification and regression analysis, using hyperplanes to separate different classes.

models.name: XGBoost
models.description: An optimized distributed gradient boosting library designed to be highly efficient, flexible, and portable.

models.name: LightGBM
models.description: A gradient boosting framework that uses tree-based learning algorithms, designed for distributed and efficient training.
